text: Edward Griffith was an American politician who served in the New York State Assembly from 1973 to 2000. He represented the constituency consisting of the East New York neighborhood in Brooklyn. In 2000, he lost the Democratic primary to his former aide Diane Gordon.NEW YORK PRIMARY: THE LEGISLATURE; Most Incumbents Prevail Over Primary Challengers by Clifford J. Levy, in The New York Times on September 13, 2000Political Career Began With a Startling Upset by Jonathan P. Hicks, in The New York Times on July 11, 2006 ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Members of the New York State Assembly Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:New York (state) Democrats Category:Politicians from Brooklyn
title: Edward Griffith (politician)
